meanings.sent1: He was duking his opponent in the boxing match.
meanings.sent2: The bully was always duking smaller kids on the playground.
meanings.sent3: The siblings were playfully duking each other for fun.
meanings.sent4: In the video game, the character was constantly duking enemies to win.
meanings.sent5: The knight was bravely duking the dragon to protect the kingdom.

meanings.definition: To engage in a physical fight.
meanings.sent1: The two wrestlers were duking it out in the ring.
meanings.sent2: The cats were duking over a piece of fish.
meanings.sent3: The kids were playfully duking in the pillow fight.
meanings.sent4: The rival gangs were constantly duking for control of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The superheroes were duking the villains to save the city.

meanings.definition: To compete or struggle for supremacy.
meanings.sent1: The two companies were duking it out for the top spot in the market.
meanings.sent2: The political candidates were duking in a heated debate.
meanings.sent3: The chefs were duking in a cooking competition for the title.
meanings.sent4: The teams were duking for the championship trophy.
meanings.sent5: The students were duking for the highest grade in the class.
